
```{r doc-formatting-setup, echo = F, error=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
if (is.na(params$input_document) || params$input_document == "NA") {
  word_count <- NA
} else {
  word_count <- wordcountaddin:::word_count(params$input_document)
}
```
